command: cat input | rush -k -j 20 'xyz=$(echo "{}" | unfurl domains) && ffuf -t 60 -fc 404 -maxtime 2400 -v -timeout 10 -H "User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/117.0" -w _wordlist_ -u "{}/FUZZ" -o $xyz.json -od $xyz -of json ; if [ -f $xyz.json ]; then ffufPostprocessing -result-file $xyz.json -bodies-folder $xyz -delete-bodies -overwrite-result-file && cat $xyz.json | tee -a output ; sudo rm $xyz.json ; fi'
